overview: They can be together in the locker room or fooling about in the showers, it doesn’t matter to these boys. What counts is that they’re taking team-bonding to a whole new level, as they suck and fuck like total whores. Kai Alexander, Aaron Aurora, Skylar Blu – this crowd of horny youngsters aren’t so much interested in the final score as making sure they score after the final whistle! Culminating in a scorching four-man raw spunk-fest that’ll have you reaching for your cock and kicking out a generous wad of appreciative, sport-induced jizz!
title: Play to Win
